alice.tuprologx.ide
Class JavaEditArea

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  alice.tuprologx.ide.JavaEditArea
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileEditArea, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class JavaEditArea
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements FileEditArea

An edit area for the Java 2 platform. Makes use of an advanced Swing text area.

Version:
1.0 - 14-nov-02
Author:
Giulio Piancastelli
See Also:
Serialized Form
